sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RIMINI an ancient, populous, and handſome town of Italy, in Romagna, which is part of the territory of the church, with a biſhop’s ſee, an old caſtle, and a ſtrong tower ; as alſo many remains of antiquity, and very fine buildings. It is famous for a council in 1359, conſiſting of 400 biſhops, who were all Arians except 20. It is ſeated in a fertile plain, at the mouth of the river Marecchia, on the gulph of Venice. E. Long. 12. 39. N. Lat. 44. 6.
